body:
Sorry should have mentioned, underscore also does not work.

On 28 Dec 2016 9:44 p.m., "Yifei Feng" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> It could be something with the '_' and '-' replacement.
> https://pypi.python.org/simple/tensorflow_gpu/ seems to work as well.
> @sjperkins <https://github.com/sjperkins> do you mind try replacing
> tensorflow-gpu with tensorflow_gpu?
